reviewText: Not as good as the Haunted History "Ghost Ships" episode, but it is a good second.  Gives a decent but not comprehensive account of some maritime legends.

Having been a sailor in the US Navy, I've heard of many strange things at sea. Some can be explained away, but others aren't so easy to explain. The spirits are everywhere and they stay for a reason.

Ghost Ships gives you a small quick look into Nautical Paranormal Occurrences. Enjoy
